Module Project_Milestone_3
Package Menu

Class StoreFront

java.lang.Object
Menu.StoreFront
public class StoreFront extends Object
Represents the main interface where users can interact with the store.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StoreFront(String name)
    Initializes a new StoreFront with the given name.

  • Constructor Details

    • StoreFront

      public StoreFront(String name)
      Initializes a new StoreFront with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the store.

  • Method Details

    • purchaseProduct

      public void purchaseProduct(salable.Salable product, int quantity)
      Purchases a specified quantity of a given product.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to purchase.
      quantity - The quantity of the product to purchase.

    • cancelPurchase

      public void cancelPurchase(salable.Salable product)
      Cancels the purchase of a given product and returns it back to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      product - The product whose purchase is to be cancelled.

    • viewCart

      public void viewCart()
      Provides a view of the items currently in the shopping cart.

    • checkout

      public void checkout()
      Handles the checkout process, displaying the current items in the cart and the total price. Asks the user for confirmation before completing the checkout.

    • displayWelcomeMessage

      public void displayWelcomeMessage()
      Displays a welcoming message to users upon their entrance to the store interface.

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Handles the checkout process for the user's cart. This method will display the cart, compute the total price, and ask the user to confirm the purchase.

    • run

      public void run()
      Contains the main logic for running the store interface and continuously interacting with the user through various menu options.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main entry point for the StoreFront application. Initializes the store interface and starts user interaction.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used in this application).
